about-me.profession: I am a Front End Developer experienced in helping companies achieve their goals by delivering high-quality software solutions. I have skills in React, React Hooks, Next.js, Bootstrap, Scss, TailwindCSS, TypeScript and unit testing, as well as experience in version control with Git.
about-me.committed: I am committed to creating interactive and responsive experiences for users, constantly seeking to learn and apply best practices to deliver efficient solutions.

ctc-tech.description: Institutional website developed for the company CTC Tech.

loginfo.responsibilities:
• Development and support of web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript and CakePHP.
  • Development and maintenance of web applications using PHP and CakePHP, ensuring robust and scalable functionalities.

ctc-tech.responsibilities:
• Development of web applications using JavaScript, PHP and React.
  • Responsible for the front-end development of a toll calculation system in ReactJS, optimizing the process and providing greater efficiency for customers.
  • Development of dynamic and interactive components with Vue.js, taking advantage of the framework's capabilities to build modern and efficient web applications.
  • Implementing responsive, cross-device-friendly designs, combining HTML, CSS, and JavaScript skills to ensure a consistent experience across all platforms.

click-code.responsibilities:
• Creation of Landing Pages with customization of WordPress themes and plugins according to client needs. This resulted in attractive and functional pages, increasing the conversion rate and target audience engagement.
  • Implementation of scalable and secure WordPress solutions, ensuring optimized performance and efficient website maintenance.
  • Integration of advanced and customized functionalities, such as e-commerce, content management systems and API integration, to meet customer demands.

next-tecnologia.responsibilities:
• Development of web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Laravel Framework and WordPress.
  • I led the development of the company's institutional website, being responsible for the front end and back end.
  • Responsible for the complete development of a study system using Laravel. I developed both the back end and front end, offering users a robust and intuitive course platform.
  • Collaborate in agile teams to create and maintain reusable front-end components, promoting efficiency and consistency in software development.

trial.responsibilities:
• Development of web applications using JavaScript, ReactJS, Laravel Framework and WordPress.
  • Leadership in the development of an e-commerce in WordPress to sell football shirts. It contributes to the success of e-commerce, providing an intuitive and attractive shopping experience, resulting in a significant amount of sales.
  • I participated in the development of a React Native application for natural massages, providing convenience to users when scheduling therapies in the comfort of home.
